newsitem.title: USA: Dynamics Corp stake cut by Gabelli.
newsitem.headline: Dynamics Corp stake cut by Gabelli.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Tuesday it reduced its stake in Dynamics Corp of America to 781,900 common shares or 20.48 percent.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 31,000 common shares sold between January 28 and March 27 at prices ranging from $26.4967 to $33.50 per share.

Dynamics of Greenwich, Conn., designs, manufactures and markets a variety of electrical appliances and electronic devices, fabricated metal products and equipment, and power and controlled environmental devices.
